item.title: 据当局称，周二盐湖城一家殡仪馆外发生斗殴，三人被刺伤，一人中枪。
item.description:
Three people were stabbed and one person was shot after a fight broke out outside a funeral home in Salt Lake City on Tuesday, authorities said. https://t.co/b92QXIX6lW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 根据共和党初选的初步出口民调结果，俄亥俄州半数表示支持尼基-海利的共和党初选选民表示，他们将在11月支持拜登总统。
item.description:
Half of Republican primary voters in Ohio who say they support Nikki Haley say they would back Pres. Biden in November, according to preliminary exit poll results from the GOP primary.https://t.co/Gwcv8YsT8e pic.twitter.com/cS36fuDQhb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 根据共和党初选的初步出口民调结果，俄亥俄州半数表示支持尼基-海利的共和党初选选民表示，他们将在11月支持拜登总统。
item.description:
Half of Republican primary voters in Ohio who say they support Nikki Haley say they would back Pres. Biden in November, according to preliminary exit poll results from the GOP primary. https://t.co/ifV8TmeoP5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）选择公布其人工智能聊天机器人 Grok 背后的代码，从而颠覆了这场争论：
item.description:
Some of the world’s largest companies are fighting over a question that will help shape the future of AI: Should firms reveal how their products work?

Elon Musk has upended the debate by opting to release the code behind his AI chatbot, Grok.

Learn more: https://t.co/v15WGmzZ32

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最近，一种被称为 "鲸龙 "的重甲古鳄鱼祖先物种的化石被鉴定出来，让我们得以一窥 2.15 亿年前的世界。
item.description:
The recent identification of fossils from a heavily armored ancient crocodile ancestor species, known as aetosaurs, provides a glimpse into our world 215 million years ago. https://t.co/SLdrsxgpnw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 特朗普称他可能被迫以 "火卖价格 "出售资产，以支付民事欺诈案中的 4.64 亿美元保证金。
item.description:
Trump says he might be forced to sell assets at "fire sale prices" to satisfy $464 million bond in civil fraud case. https://t.co/FLq1fWWRpz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 亚利桑那州一名议员透露她怀有一个无法存活的胎儿，并表示她计划进行人工流产，她在州参议院的发言中详细介绍了她在该州寻求医疗服务的经历。
item.description:
An Arizona state lawmaker revealed she is pregnant with a nonviable fetus and said she plans to get an abortion, taking the floor in the state Senate to detail her experience seeking care in the state. https://t.co/k2ULFa1bdJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在周二晚上的开奖之前，"兆彩 "头奖奖金已飙升至 8.93 亿美元，是 "兆彩 "历史上第六大头奖。根据 Mega Millions 的数据，中大奖的几率为 1/302,575,350。
item.description:
The Mega Millions jackpot has surged to $893 million ahead of Tuesday night's drawing.

The total is the sixth-largest in Mega Millions history. The odds of winning the jackpot are 1 in 302,575,350, according to Mega Millions. https://t.co/AafHOh6Wnd pic.twitter.com/qvKnr0zqLw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 联邦调查局局长克里斯托弗-雷（Christopher Wray）表示，联邦调查局正竭尽全力为被非法入境移民杀害的大学生莱肯-莱利（Laken Riley）讨回 "公道"。
item.description:
The FBI is doing everything it can to get "justice" for Laken Riley, the college student who was murdered by a migrant in the country illegally, FBI Director Christopher Wray said. https://t.co/LBbevqx0Yv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 据当地执法部门称，密歇根州众议员丹-基尔迪（Dan Kildee）的兄弟蒂姆-基尔迪（Tim Kildee）于周二清晨在密歇根州基尼西县（Genesee County）的一起枪击案中丧生。
item.description:
Michigan Rep. Dan Kildee's brother, Tim Kildee, was killed in a shooting early Tuesday morning in Genesee County, Michigan, according to local law enforcement. https://t.co/RnANupJxkx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 当局称，一辆卡车在加利福尼亚州加油站行驶时，一名无人照看的 3 岁儿童坐在方向盘后，该车致命地撞倒了一名 2 岁女童。
item.description:
An unattended 3-year-old child was behind the wheel of a truck left running at a California gas station when the vehicle fatally struck a 2-year-old girl, authorities said. https://t.co/qqlExAwuoC pic.twitter.com/9f8cZ9AE0G

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国前总统特朗普周二正式向最高法院提出申诉，说明为何应全面授予他总统豁免权，使其免受刑事起诉。
item.description:
BREAKING: Former Pres. Trump on Tuesday formally made his case to the Supreme Court for why he should be granted sweeping presidential immunity from criminal prosecution. https://t.co/urdJ2JnDFu pic.twitter.com/0TCvxeAAHm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 密西西比州前治安官亨特-埃尔沃德（Hunter Elward）因 2023 年 1 月对两名黑人实施酷刑而认罪，周二在联邦法院被判处约 20 年监禁。
item.description:
Former Mississippi sheriff's deputy Hunter Elward was sentenced in federal court Tuesday to roughly 20 years after pleading guilty to the January 2023 torture of two Black men. https://t.co/IkkqUpigRK pic.twitter.com/oKgF6inrb2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国前总统特朗普周二正式向最高法院提出申诉，说明为何应全面授予他总统豁免权，使其免受刑事起诉。
item.description:
BREAKING: Former Pres. Trump on Tuesday formally made his case to the Supreme Court for why he should be granted sweeping presidential immunity from criminal prosecution. https://t.co/ygvCN1oD39

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 莱利-斯特恩（Riley Strain）在田纳西州纳什维尔失踪的当晚，与他在一起的兄弟会兄弟 "伤心欲绝"，斯特恩的母亲说，寻找这名 22 岁男孩的工作仍在继续。
item.description:
The fraternity brothers who were with Riley Strain on the night he vanished in Nashville, Tennessee, are "heartbroken" as the search for the 22-year-old continues, Strain's mother said. https://t.co/jZNwl0Kl8M

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 香港立法会一致通过了一项严格的保安法，该法在提交 11 天后即获得通过，速度异常之快。
item.description:
Hong Kong's legislature has unanimously passed a strict security law, 11 days after it was tabled in an unusually fast turnaround. https://t.co/wHyoftnfq4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 组织者说，反拜登 "未承诺 "运动在几个州的初选中取得相对成功后，计划在今年秋天的大选中继续向总统施压。
item.description:
The anti-Biden "uncommitted" movement plans to continue pressuring the president through the general election this fall after seeing relative success in a few state primaries, organizers said. https://t.co/FzMxlUcWo0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在不到两周的时间里，一家全球图片社第二次对威尔士王妃凯特分享的王室家族照片发出了编辑通知。
item.description:
For the second time in less than two weeks, a global photo agency has issued an editing notice on a royal family photo shared by Kate, the Princess of Wales. https://t.co/6OSr0zSjI6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: "在康普顿长大的我从来没有想过，有一天我会和我儿时的一些英雄们一起出现在这里。"周二，Dr. Dre 与 Snoop Dogg、Eminem、50 Cent 和 Jimmy Iovine 一起为他在好莱坞星光大道上的明星揭幕。
item.description:
“Growing up in Compton I never imagined that I would one day be represented here among some of my childhood heroes.”

Dr. Dre was joined by Snoop Dogg, Eminem, 50 Cent and Jimmy Iovine as his star was unveiled Tuesday on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. https://t.co/msl64AUJi8 pic.twitter.com/vCTG7PKlcH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 召回警报：乔氏超市（Trader Joe's）在一份在线声明中宣布，由于可能受到沙门氏菌污染，该店将召回部分批次的少盐 50%烘烤和加盐全腰果。
item.description:
RECALL ALERT: Trader Joe's is recalling certain batches of its 50% Less Salt Roasted & Salted Whole Cashews due to potential salmonella contamination, the store announced in a statement online. https://t.co/fTJL3GQZi9 pic.twitter.com/sFimuxKia8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 请看：一段视频记录了一列火车在马萨诸塞州铁路道口撞上一辆拖拉机拖车的戏剧性瞬间。
item.description:
SEE IT: Video captured the dramatic moment a train smashed into a tractor-trailer sitting in the middle of a rail crossing in Massachusetts.

Nobody in the incident was injured. https://t.co/B1vha8sdy7 pic.twitter.com/0iiSVQIaem

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：最高法院驳回了拜登政府提出的干预请求，即在下级法院对德克萨斯州严格的移民执法法提出质疑时，暂时搁置该法。
item.description:
BREAKING: The Supreme Court has rejected a Biden administration request to intervene and keep Texas's strict immigration enforcement law on hold while it is challenged in lower courts. https://t.co/P3XeBlmpwN pic.twitter.com/CwTWcDn4WZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：最高法院驳回了拜登政府的请求，即在下级法院对德克萨斯州被称为 SB 4 的严格移民执法法提出质疑时，最高法院应介入并搁置该法。
item.description:
BREAKING: The Supreme Court has rejected a Biden administration request to intervene and keep Texas's strict immigration enforcement law, known as SB 4, on hold while it is challenged in lower courts. https://t.co/JUrsgKMSHR

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 每年三月，佛罗里达最热门的海滩都会挤满来自全国各地的大学生，他们在春假期间尽情享受阳光、饮料和活力。
item.description:
Every March, Florida's hottest beach locations are filled with college students from across the country enjoying the sun, drinks and energy of spring break.

But this year, things are different. https://t.co/PC2SRLPwKs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 巴西前总统雅伊尔-博尔索纳罗周二被正式指控伪造其 COVID-19 疫苗接种数据，这是对这位备受争议的极右翼领导人的首次起诉，可能还会有更多指控。
item.description:
The former president of Brazil, Jair Bolsonaro, was formally accused Tuesday of falsifying his COVID-19 vaccination data, marking the first indictment for the embattled far-right leader, with more allegations potentially in store. https://t.co/gX6rxpQsZh pic.twitter.com/kXywL6jS3l

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 负责监督美国 2021 年从阿富汗撤军的两位最高军事领导人将在众议院一个委员会的听证会上作证，该听证会旨在评估拜登政府在当时的混乱局面中所扮演的角色。
item.description:
The top two military leaders who oversaw the U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan in 2021 are testifying before a House committee in a hearing meant to assess the Biden administration's role in the chaos that unfolded. https://t.co/miMRZ2nkPd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：根据民事起诉书，乔纳森-马约斯（Jonathan Majors）的前女友格蕾丝-贾巴里（Grace Jabbari）以诽谤和其他所谓的伤害为由，起诉了乔纳森-马约斯。
item.description:
BREAKING: Grace Jabbari, the ex-girlfriend of Jonathan Majors, whom he was convicted of assaulting in a trial last year, has sued the actor for defamation and other alleged injuries, according to the civil complaint. https://t.co/fAKzEQUjiM pic.twitter.com/uMugXEkzYx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：根据民事起诉书，乔纳森-马约斯（Jonathan Majors）的前女友格蕾丝-贾巴里（Grace Jabbari）以诽谤和其他所谓的伤害为由，起诉了乔纳森-马约斯。
